-- | Please see the README on GitHub at

@package vegaview
@version 0.1.0.0


-- | Simple Plot functions for convenience
module Graphics.Vega.VegaLite.Simple

-- | Heatmap with given x and y columns.
heatmap :: ([DataColumn] -> [DataColumn]) -> Text -> Text -> Text -> [Double] -> VegaLite

-- | Draw a bar chart
barChart :: Text -> Text -> [Text] -> [Double] -> VegaLite

-- | Draw a bar chart with error bar
barChartErr :: Text -> Text -> [Text] -> [Double] -> Double -> VegaLite

-- | Draw Density Plot
densityPlot :: Text -> [Double] -> VegaLite


-- | VegaList Plot Viewer
module Graphics.Vega.VegaLite.View

-- | Plot VegaLite with given Title
show' :: VegaLite -> IO ()
